name: Book 4 Deal- Babies & Family
description:
This is our best package deal yet!  Book 4 sessions within 1 year and you will pay only $99 per session which includes a cd with printing rights of your 10 favorite images.  The total must be paid by the 2nd session and you may schedule your sessions anytime throughout the year.  

The shooting time will be up to 45 minutes for babies, kids and families.  This deal does not apply to senior portraits or weddings.

Perfect for documenting baby's first year (can include maternity also),  birthdays, holidays, etc.!

Large groups over 7 may require additional fees.  Please contact me first to make arrangements.

name: $100 Wedding Deposit
description: A $100 deposit is required to hold your selected date.  The deposit will count toward your final balance.

name: Don't Want to Miss a Thing
description:
$1120- Includes 5 hours of coverage + $500 print credit

CD with full printing release comes with this package.

All packages include a 1 hour engagement session with a 5.5 x 5 .5 soft cover photo book of up to 20 engagement photo poses with personalized cover and one 11x14 mounted print.

$100 deposit to book, the remaining balance due by the wedding day.


New Print Pricing:

1- 4x5 $8
1- 5x7 $12
1- 8x10 $25
1- 11x14 $49
1- 16x20 $75
1- 20x24 $125

Wallets (1 pose per set)
8- $16
24- $38
48- $58
72- $75

8x11 Hardcover Book (up to 60 images)- $125

2.5x 3.5 Acordian Mini Book- $48

16 x 24 Printed Canvas Wrap- $165

name: 2 Hour Photography Package
description:
2 Hour package- In studio and the location of your choice.

Includes $200 worth of prints or products (your choice! no set packages!)

Travel more than 20 miles outside of the Bolivar/Halfway Missouri area may incur extra mileage fees.

This may include Senior Portraits, Families, Kids, Friends, Maternity, etc. Weddings must refer to the wedding price list.

name: 1 Hour Photography Package
description:
1 Hour package- either in studio or at the location of your choice.

Includes $150 worth of prints or products (your choice! no set packages!)

Travel more than 20 miles outside of the Bolivar/Halfway Missouri area may incur extra mileage fees.


This may include Senior Portraits, Families, Kids, Friends, Maternity, etc.   Weddings must refer to the wedding price list.
